core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix swiss minimalism with soft utility.
Content is King: The booking flow is a narrative.
Negative Space: Generous padding to prevent claustrophobia in widgets.
Mobile First: The widget must be thumb-friendly.
anti_patterns: No generic centered layouts without tension.
No clutter - every pixel must serve the booking conversion.

typography.installation: Ensure Manrope and Inter are imported via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.

primary.description: A deep zinc/black for high contrast. Customizable by user.

widget.container: max-w-[480px] w-full mx-auto bg-card rounded-xl shadow-xl overflow-hidden border border-border/50
widget.isolation: Use scoped CSS modules or specific class prefixes (e.g., 'ebs-') to prevent style bleeding.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:opacity-90 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium

inputs.default: h-11 rounded-lg border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50
inputs.date_picker: Custom Shadcn Calendar with generous padding and clear selected states

cards.service_card: group relative flex items-center p-4 border rounded-xl hover:border-primary/50 hover:bg-accent/50 transition-all cursor-pointer space-x-4
cards.slot_card: flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-3 border rounded-lg hover:border-primary hover:bg-primary/5 hover:text-primary transition-all cursor-pointer text-sm font-medium

feedback.toast: Use Sonner for all success/error messages
feedback.loading: Skeleton loaders matching the shape of content (not generic spinners)

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-lg for the widget container, shadow-sm for cards. Avoid heavy dropshadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid border-border. Use border-primary for active states.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-xl for containers, rounded-lg for inner elements, rounded-full for buttons.
visual_enhancers.motion: Use framer-motion for step transitions (slide-in from right, fade out to left).

images.usage_rules: Use these images for default service placeholders or demo data. All images must have alt text.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast for text. Use APCA guidelines.
accessibility.keyboard: Full keyboard navigation support for the calendar and time slots.
accessibility.aria: ARIA labels on all icon-only buttons. data-testid on all interactive elements.

widget_implementation: Build the widget as a standalone component that can be mounted anywhere.
Use 'Manrope' for the widget headings to give it character.
Ensure the calendar is touch-friendly (44px min tap target).
The 'Book' button must be sticky at the bottom on mobile.
admin_implementation: Keep the design dense but legible (Data density mode).
Use 'Inter' for the admin interface for maximum readability.
general: Follow the E1 'Fusion over Imitation' rule - don't make it look like a default Bootstrap site.
Ensure all inputs have clear focus states.

do_not: Do not use generic 'blue' (#3b82f6) as the primary unless overridden.
Do not use gradients for the background of the widget.
Do not center text in the form inputs.
must: Must use 'data-testid' for all interactive elements.
Must support mobile responsive layouts (stack on small screens).
